rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your programs.)[/i]
When this Subroutine enters, create a 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature token with flying, draw two cards, and gain 4 life.
Whenever this Subroutine runs, sacrifice a creature, discard two cards, and lose 4 life.
notes:
!tokens Program B EIW
